recipe.title: Asian Chicken and Cabbage Salad
ingredients: 1 red jalapeño or Fresno chile with some seeds, chopped
1 teaspoon fish sauce (such as nam pla or nuoc nam)
1/2 small head of red cabbage, thinly sliced (about 5 cups)
6 scallions, whites and pale greens only, thinly sliced
instructions: Whisk chile, oil, lime juice, soy sauce, brown sugar, fish sauce, and ginger in a large bowl; season with salt. Add cabbage, carrots, scallions, chicken, spinach, and cilantro; toss to coat. Top with peanuts and sesame seeds.
